casebody.data:
George D. SMITH, Appellant, v. FEDERATED PUBLICATIONS, Inc., a Delaware Corporation, Appellee. No. 8609. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. March 14, 1941. Lucking, Van Auken & Sprague, of Detroit, Mich., for appellant. Walsh, Walsh & O’Sullivan, of Port Huron, Mich., and James Cleary, of Battle Creek, Mich., for appellee.

Before HICKS, ALLEN, and MARTIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This cause was heard on the transcript of the record, briefs and argument of counsel.

On consideration whereof, it is ordered, adjudged and decreed that the order appealed from, be and the same is affirmed upon the authority of Trustees of Internal Improvement Fund v. Greenough, 105 U.S. 527, 26 L.Ed. 1157.
